!!! note
    This is correct for only versions of sc-machine that >= 0.10.0.
---

| ScType::CommonEdge              | Not specified                                                          | ```?<=>```           |

| ScType::VarCommonArc            | <img src="../images/scg/scg_var_common_arc.png"></img>                 | ```_=> or <=_```     |
